description:
Enjoy banking at your fingertips – anytime,
anywhere. Now you can do your personal
banking securely from your mobile. Kina Personal
Online Banking app lets you manage your
existing Kina Bank transactional and savings
accounts. 

You’ll be happy to know you’ll be able to do
almost all the things you’d normally do at a
Kina Bank branch – like transfer funds, make
payments, view your accounts, check balances,
download online statements and much more. 

To start using Kina Personal Online Banking, you’ll
need to be an existing Kina Bank customer. Then,
simply visit Kina Personal Online Banking on the
Kina Bank website and create an account. Fill
out the online form, including your existing Kina
Bank account details, and soon you’ll be banking
securely and quickly anytime or anywhere you
choose!

It’s free to use Kina Personal Online Banking, but
the accounts you manage there will have their
normal associated fees.

Manage your Credit Bank PNG accounts effortlessly with CBP Mobile Banking. Access real-time balances, transfer funds, mobile top-up, and set card pins. Our secure app protects your financial transactions with advanced features, including biometric authentication. Stay connected and informed with timely notifications. Download now for a seamless and convenient banking experience tailored to your needs.

Welcome to Kina Corporate Mobile App. 
Our Corporate Mobile Banking puts you in control 24/7. Banking anytime, anywhere.

With just a click of a button you can:
•	View your account portfolio and check balances,
•	Download  eStatements 
•	Transfer funds and make payments
•	Stop lost or stolen cheques 
•	Schedule and pay staff salaries 
•	Set up recurring payments
And much more.

Important information:
•	To use Kina Corporate Mobile Banking, you must have an active Corporate Internet Banking username & password; 
•	If you are an existing Kina Corporate Internet Banking users, you can simply use your existing user username & password to log onto Kina Corporate Mobile Banking;
•	If you do not have an existing Kina Corporate Internet Banking user account, please contact your nearest Branch or your Relationship Manager;
•	Compatible with iOS 6.1 or higher;

Need help?
•	Terms & Conditions: http://www.mykina.com.pg/retail/
•	Locations: http://www.kina.com.pg/contact/locations/ 
•	Security Alerts: http://www.kina.com.pg/security-alert/
•	Twitter: https://twitter.com/KinaGroupPNG
•	Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/KinaGroup
•	Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/kina-securities

Convenient, accessible and secure banking is our priority at BSP.

BSP PNG App is our innovative solution to conduct banking on the go. It is now available for our personal and business customers. Access your personal and business profiles on one device.


Manage your personal banking
•	Make multiple transfers to BSP, Other Banks or overseas banks in one transaction
•	Make your utility payments
•	Apply for a Personal Loan
•	Apply for a Current or Savings Account
•	Self-Register for Internet Banking
•	Track your application ( Loan, Current Account or Savings Account)
•	Make loan repayments
•	View your Loan repayment schedule
•	View and download e-receipts
•	View and download your transaction history in different formats
•	ATM/Branch/BSP Agent locator


Manage your business
•	View and download statements
•	Make your employee salary payments
•	Create and approve payments on the go
•	Make multiple transfers to BSP, Other Banks or overseas banks in one transaction
•	View and print statements for Term Deposits and Loans
•	View  and initiate Trade Finance instruments 
•	View Overdraft limits online
•	Make multiple Bill payments in one transaction
•	Send a secure bank mail to BSP
•	Stop Cheques
•	Perform Cheque status inquiry
•	Update contact information
•	View transaction limits online


Important information:
• Our BSP PNG App is free. Your mobile carrier’s message and data rates may apply
• No personal data is stored on your device

Your money and personal details are protected because;
•	BSP PNG App is guarded by encryption to ensure none of your personal or banking details are stored on your device
•	One time Passwords provide  second layer of authentication for registrations and transactions.
•	BSP PNG App locks you out if you repeatedly use the wrong password or one time password and will time out if the app is running for too long with no activity


How to log onto BSP PNG App?
Customers can login using the Internet Banking username and password.  Personal BSP customers can also use the self-register option to activate BSP PNG App. 


Password Requirement for App:  
•	Must not be a ‘common’ password.
•	Be at least eight (8) characters long but not more than fifteen (15) characters.
•	Contain at least one number (0-9), one upper case letter (A-Z) and one lower case letter (a-z) .
•	Contain a minimum of one special character (Allowed characters are @,%,+,',!,#,$,?,:,.,(,),-,_,`)
•	Must not contain more than 3 consecutive alpha-characters.  
•	Must not contain more 2 identical characters consecutively.


Contact our Customer Service Centre on 320 1212/7030 1212, email servicebsp@bsp.com.pg, visit our website www.bsp.com.pg or visit your nearest branch for more information

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Bank.South.Pacific
Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/bspfinancialgrouplimited/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BSPPacific
LinkedIn: https://pg.linkedin.com/company/bsp-financial-group-limited

Welcome to the NASFUND Smartphone APP! This app provides a great mobile experience for managing your superannuation account on the go. After following a simple registration process, you can access details of your super and transactions with secure access via your 4-digit PIN.

With the NASFUND Smartphone APP you can:
• Set quick access 4-digit PIN
• View your account details
• View your investment details
• View your transaction details
And more!

The Wallet allows users to load funds and use the same for transfers, bill payments, merchant payments and much more. It can also be linked to the user bank account using card and provide balance inquiries and bank transfers. Users can send and request money, get detailed statements and even request for bank account opening. Wallet is completely secure and uses MPIN or Biometrics for login. OTP or ATM PIN is used as second factor authentication for all financial transactions. YumiPei wallet is one of its kind product launched in Papua New Guinea by TISA Bank.

Data Self-Portrait is a unique application for tracking life data and artistic visualization. By recording daily data such as sleep, consumption, mood and activities, the application transforms the dull numbers into flowing abstract art graphics, allowing you to "see" your life patterns from a new perspective. The minimalist information visualization design style, combined with the colorful data flow effect, enables your personalized data portrait to continuously evolve with each data addition, showcasing your unique life trajectory. It supports data statistics analysis, historical record management and data export functions. All data is stored locally, ensuring the protection of your privacy and security.

Gate is committed to providing secure and reliable trading services for Bitcoin, Ethereum, and over4,000 cryptocurrencies. With over 12 years of industry experience and 44 million users, Gate has become the preferred platform for crypto investors worldwide. 

A full-range crypto exchange with everything you want to trade. BTC, ETH, XRP, HBAR, MOODENG, DOGE, ADA, PEPE, SOL, SUI, LINK, DOT, KAS, EOS, CRV, ORDI, TAO, LTC, SHIB, JASMY, ENA, SEI, AVAX, RATS, XLM, FTM, APEPE, XRP5L, POL, RSR, FIL, ALGO, CFX, BCH, ETC, SUNDOG, KAIA, PNUT, BNB, NEAR, MAF, BAN, EML, BIGTIME, TOKEN, VIRTUAL, TIA, SATS, BOME, UNI, OM, and over4,000 more assets.

A full-featured crypto exchange offering all the top products in one place.
• Spot Trading: Supports full-range assets — including newly-listed tokens, margin trading, BRC-20, AI, MEME, RWA, DePin, ETH2.0 staking, ETFs, 5x leveraged ETFs, Layer 2, platform tokens, DeFi, and more.
• Futures:
Perpetuals, delivery contracts and more — covering 100+ markets with 0 maker fees. Enjoy points redemption and various rewards.
• Alpha:
Gate Alpha provides one-click access to all on-chain assets, supporting the widest range of tokens with minute-level listing speed. Earn Alpha points through holding and trading, which can be used to participate in token airdrops, TGE subscriptions, and limited-time events, unlocking additional benefits.
• Web3:
A new Web3 portal through which you can explore Gate Layer, Gate Perp DEX, Gate Fun, Meme Go, Web3 Launchpad, and more, and dive straight into the on-chain world.
• Launchpool:
Stake GT, USDT, ETH, and other major assets to earn new project tokens. Hourly airdrops, low entry, and high yield help you seize new market opportunities easily.
• CandyDrop:
Complete simple tasks like trading, depositing or inviting friends to earn ""candy"" and join lucky draws for new project tokens. Zero barrier and huge rewards.
• HODLer:
Hold just 1 GT to automatically receive airdrops from multiple projects, with no lockups or extra actions required. Simply hold, and earn.
• Launchpad:
Access early-stage, high-quality token launches and share the upside. Strict screening ensures quality, and fair mechanisms protect your participation rights.
• Earn:
Offers a variety of wealth-management products, including Simple Earn, Auto-Invest, Dual Investment, Quant Funds, Crypto Loan, and more. Stake BTC, ETH, and GT to earn higher APR. VIP users enjoy extra benefits.
• Bots:
Supports a full range of trading bots across spot and futures, including Grid Bot, Martingale Bot, Smart Rebalance Bot, Arbitrage Bot, Inter-Exchange Arbitrage Bot, Infinite Grid, Margin Grid, CTA-Expert Bot, Signal Bot, and more.
• Copy Trading:
Gate Copy Trading allows users to instantly replicate the spot and futures trades of professional traders or lead traders, enabling rapid execution of trading strategies with an overall position synchronization rate of up to 99.99%.
• Community:
Stay at the forefront of crypto news and discussions with Gate Community. Explore real-time updates, live streams, and hot-topic chats to catch upcoming events and breaking news.

- First exchange to commit to 100% Proof of Reserves
Gate's reserves cover over 200 digital assets, leveraging Merkle trees and zero-knowledge proof technology to fully secure user funds, with an excess reserve exceeding $11.676 billion.
- Premium experience with 24/7 support
We provide 24/7 customer support, allowing users to contact Gate anytime through support channels for the best service experience. For any inquiries, you can email us at: support@gate.com.

Join Our Community
X: https://x.com/gate_io
Telegram: https://t.me/gate_official_bot/
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/GateioCrypto

Your dollars deserve the best. Our #1 App* is secure, smart and packed with handy tools for everyday banking. With the latest security features and payments made simple, you can bank with confidence. 

You'll also have access to money management tools and insights, designed to make it easier to plan, keep track of things and increase your money confidence. 

Business banking? Switch seamlessly from personal to business banking in the App, so you can manage your money in one place.

We’ve made it easier for you to manage your Western Union transfers with the Western Union: Self Service app. 

If you need to request money from a friend or family member, track a transfer, redirect an incoming transfer to your bank account, or find a nearby Western Union agent location – we have you covered. 

 

Key features: 


• Request money from your sender 
Do you need extra money? Now you can make money requests from senders in multiple countries whenever you need it. With the Western Union: Self Service app, requesting money has never been easier. 

• Track a money transfer 
To track your money transfer in real time, enter the tracking number (MTCN) and get the real-time status of your money. 

• Redirect transfers 
You can redirect any cash transfer to your bank account for fast and secure access to your funds. 

• Find a Western Union agent location 
Your app can also help you find a nearby Western Union agent location in just a few taps. Remember that our Western Union agent locations are independent businesses providing our money transfer services to our customers. 

• Get in touch with us 

No matter what questions or concerns you may have, we’re here for you. You can also get in touch by visiting a nearby Western Union agent location. 

 


With the Western Union: Self Service app, you can now change the way you receive money in Morocco and the Philippines! 




Services may be provided by Western Union Financial Services, Inc. NMLS# 906983 and/or Western Union International Services, LLC NMLS# 906985. See terms and conditions for details. Certain features may not be available to or from all countries and are subject to change. Learn more in the Western Union: Self Service app. 

The information transmitted, including any content in this communication, is confidential, intended only for the use of the intended recipient, and is the property of the Western Union Company or its affiliates and subsidiaries. If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any use of the information contained in or transmitted with this communication, or dissemination, distribution, or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited. If you have received this communication in error, please notify the Western Union sender immediately by replying to this message and delete the original message.

CommSec app – Australia’s home of investing^. 

Join over 2 million Australians actively investing with confidence on the CommSec app. Discover, research, and trade thousands of shares and ETFs on the ASX, plus access leading global markets, all from your mobile. 

 

Invest in Australian and global markets 

· Gain access to thousands of ASX-listed shares and ETFs, plus leading U.S markets, making it easy to invest in the companies you know and trust. 

· Browse, research, and trade with ease. 

· Expand your portfolio using exclusive in-app data and market insights.  

 

Stay ahead with real-time updates 

· Get live prices, instant market movers, and volume updates as they happen. 

· Stay informed with breaking ASX news, expert analysis, and exclusive stock research. 

· Get the latest market insights and trends from the dedicated CommSec Markets team, so you know what’s happening right now. 

  

Track your portfolio with Home 

· See your portfolio performance over time with interactive charts in your personalised Home. 

· Quickly view your holdings, monitor changes, and stay on top of your investment journey, all in one place. 

  

Build your knowledge with The Academy 

· Learn anytime, anywhere. Enjoy free, bite-sized learning topics in the palm of your hand. 

· Learn the basics of investing or brush up on your skills. There’s something for everyone. 

  

Smart tools for every investor 

· Set price and market alerts to receive instant push notifications for the stocks you follow. 

· Track your investments on the go with interactive portfolio charts and performance graphs. 

· Create and manage multiple personalised watchlists for faster decision-making. 

  

Secure & simple account management 

· Manage your CommSec and linked CommBank accounts securely and seamlessly. 

· Transfer funds, access annual statements, and view comprehensive tax and dividend histories all in one place. 

· Keep your account safe with advanced security features, including biometric login with Face ID and fingerprint recognition. 

  

Trade fast, trade safe 

· Place orders quickly and confidently with just a few taps. 

· Add an extra layer of security by setting up a trading password for your trades. 

· Enjoy seamless settlement management and instant fund transfers. 

  

Why choose CommSec? 

· Australia’s largest online broker 

· Valued by millions for award-winning research, education, and reliable, secure trading. 

· Get exclusive daily market commentary and analysis from the CommSec Markets team. 

· Designed for investing on the go - fast, intuitive, and always up to date. 

 

Download CommSec today and take control of your investing journey!

 

^ Money Magazine Winner 2025 (Best value feature-packed share broker-bank owned) 

^ Investment Trends 2025 

 

Important notes 

You must have a CommSec Trading Account or Margin Loan to access the app. 

Normal data charges apply; please check with your mobile phone service provider for details. 

The content illustrated in the screenshots does not reflect current or live information. 

By downloading and using this app, you agree to the CommSec Mobile Terms of Service found at https://www.commsec.com.au/features/mobile-terms-of-service.html

 

 
For support, you can reach us on X @CommSec or email us at shares@commsec.com.au

Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk
investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. Take 2 mins to
learn more at: https://www.bitpay.com/en-gb/about/risk-summary/

Manage your cryptocurrency portfolio with BitPay’s self-custody (non-custodial) cryptocurrency
wallet. Launched in 2011, BitPay is one of the oldest and most established crypto companies
With the BitPay Wallet, your private keys and your money remain in your control at all times with
code that's 100% open source for community testing and audits. Build your portfolio with crypto
buys and swaps, hold and manage, sell crypto for cash, spend crypto with merchants and buy
gift cards, send and receive payments across wallets, and connect to Web3 experiences.
Start buying, swapping, selling, or spending a wide selection of supported crypto coins today.
Buy cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), USDC, Litecoin (Litecoin), Tether
(USDT), and hundreds more.

Supported networks include Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, Litecoin, Ripple, Dogecoin,
Polygon, Arbitrum, Optimism, and Base.

Buy Crypto:
- Buy crypto with your credit card, debit card, bank transfer, or Apple Pay
- Exchange cryptocurrencies like BTC, LTC, XRP, DOGE and more
- Crypto tracker: Buy cryptocurrency at any time with updated live crypto prices
- Get coins: Support for ERC-20 stablecoin tokens like USDT) and USDC

BitPay Crypto Wallet:
- Multichain wallet: Bitcoin wallet, Ethereum wallet, Dogecoin wallet, Litecoin wallet, XRP wallet,
Polygon wallet, Arbitrum wallet, Optimism wallet, Base wallet, and more networks supported
- 100+ total coins and tokens supported
- Cryptocurrency wallet: Includes support for testnet wallets
- Send and receive p2p payments with other wallets
- Customize wallet preferences and names
- Adjust gas fees to customize transaction confirmation times
- Import crypto wallets with seed phrases and private keys from Metamask, Trezor, Electrum,
KuCoin, Ledger, Coinbase, Exodus, Bitcoin Core, Trust Wallet and many more within the BitPay
app

Swap Crypto:
- Swap and exchange crypto with support for hundreds of coin pairs
- Cross chain swaps - from Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, XRP, and more
- 100% self-custody swaps - no centralized exchange needed

Sell Crypto:
- Sell BTC, ETH, LTC & more
- Cash out to your bank account or PayPal account

Buy Gift Cards with Crypto:
- Use your crypto balance to buy & send gift cards for retail store and brands
- Use gift cards in-store or online
- Send friends and family gift cards

Security and Privacy:
- Open-source security for community testing and audits
- Blockchain device-based security: All private keys are stored locally
- Optional multi-signature security for personal or shared wallets
- Non-custodial wallet: Take private and sole control over your cryptocurrency

BitPay Supported Cryptocurrencies:
- Bitcoin (BTC)
- Ethereum (ETH)
- Bitcoin Cash (BCH)
- Dogecoin (DOGE)
- Shiba Inu (SHIB)
- Litecoin (LTC)
- XRP (XRP)
- Dai (DAI)
- Binance USD (BUSD)
- Polygon (POL)
- USDC
- Wrapped Bitcoin (WBTC)
- Pax Dollar (USDP)
- Gemini Dollar (GUSD)
- USDT
+ hundreds more ERC-20 tokens

BitPay Supported Languages:
- French, German, Chinese (Simplified) and Spanish

The BitPay app is free and open source software. You can also view the code on GitHub at
https://github.com/bitpay/copay.

Privacy: https://bitpay.com/about/privacy
This Financial Promotion has been approved by Archax LTD on November 28, 2024.

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

PayPal UK Ltd is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) as an electronic money institution (firm reference number 994790); in relation to its regulated consumer credit activities (firm reference number 996405); and for the provision of cryptocurrency services (firm reference number 1000741). Some products and services, such as PayPal Pay in 3 and PayPal Working Capital, are not regulated by the FCA and may offer a lower level of protection. Please read product terms for further details. PayPal UK Ltd's company number is 14741686. Its registered office is 5 Fleet Place, London, United Kingdom, EC4M 7RD

Mine Chain is a visualization revenue management application designed specifically for cryptocurrency miners. It supports manual addition of mining machines and mining records.

Connect to hundreds of brokers and trade in financial markets using MetaTrader 5 for iPhone and iPad.

The mobile trading platform allows you to receive quotes of financial instruments, analyze markets using charts and technical indicators, perform demo trades, connect to brokers for live trading and view the history of trading operations.

Risk Warning: Our programs may involve real trading with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Most retail investor accounts lose money when trading financial products. You should consider whether you understand how various financial products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing money.

TRADING

• Real-time quotes of financial instruments
• Full set of trade orders, including pending orders
• Depth of Market (Level 2)
• All types of trade execution
• Complete trading history

ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY

• High-performance charts
• Customizable chart color scheme
• Configuring properties of graphical objects and indicators
• Display of four charts in one window available on the MetaTrader 5 for iPad
• Trade levels visualizing the prices of pending order, as well as SL and TP values on the chart
• Information window that displays orders, trading history, emails, news, and logs in MetaTrader 5 iPad
• Sound notifications
• Financial news — dozens of materials daily
• Secure and fast chats with other traders, creation of group chats and channels
• Support for push-notifications from the desktop platform and MQL5.community services

TECHNICAL ANALYSIS

• Interactive real-time price charts with zoom and scroll options
• 30 most popular technical indicators
• 24 analytical objects: lines, channels, geometric shapes, as well as Gann, Fibonacci and Elliott tools
• 9 timeframes: M1, M5, M15, M30, H1, H4, D1, W1 and MN
• 3 types of charts: bars, Japanese candlesticks and broken line

Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.

SEND MONEY IN REAL-TIME
• Free GCash-to-GCash transactions
• Send to multiple GCash accounts via Send to Many
• Transfer funds to other e-wallets & banks such as Maya, BPI, BDO, Unionbank, Landbank, Metrobank, Chinabank, and more
• Save bank account details for future transfers

BUY LOAD ANYTIME, ANYWHERE
• Available for all networks
• Get GCash-exclusives for Globe & TM
• Prepaid broadband, TV channel packages, and prepaid health insurance available

PAY BILLS & FEES TO 400+ BILLERS
• Settle bills in advance or past due anytime, anywhere
• Set payments reminders and save recurring billers
• GCredit accepted by select billers

PAY EASILY EVERYWHERE YOU GO
• Scan to Pay via GCash QR or QRPh at 70,000+ merchants nationwide, and in select international merchants via Alipay+ QR
• Pay with the GCash Card in 200+ countries and territories
• Pay Online securely and instantly on e-commerce platforms, and get up to P20k coverage in case of scams with Online Shopping Protect
• Link directly to the App Store to pay for subscriptions, games, movies, and more

KAYA TODAY WHEN YOU BORROW WITH GCASH
• Up to P50k credit limit and only 0.17% daily interest with GCredit
• GLoan up to P150k and as low as 1.59% monthly interest
• GGives up to P125k with zero downpayment, pay in installments up to 24 months
• Borrow Load worth P50 to P99 load promos across all networks, payable up to 14 days

MANAGE YOUR WEALTH EASILY
• GSave - one savings marketplace
              - high interest rates from trusted bank partners
              - no minimum deposit or balance
              - easy to open, manage, and access anytime
• GStocks - Instant approval, become a part-owner of the top local companies for as low as P500
• GFunds - Managed by experts, easy application, risk profile assessment, and a wide selection of funds for as low as P50

But you might experience something much more powerful than a growing bank account balance or paid off credit cards: 92% of YNABers report feeling less stressed since starting YNAB.

-Kyle, again. We didn’t even pay him to say this, but maybe we should.


Every dollar represents you—it’s the product of your energy. You work too hard for all that to go to waste. We’ll show you how to give every dollar a job, so your paychecks are working toward your priorities and values, your wants and needs, your work and your play. Your money is your life. Spend it well with YNAB.
